Statement by the Presidency of the Republic shortly
Presidency statement: The Presidency of the Republic is following the marches called by some political forces and some of them reached the perimeter of the presidential palace
Statement of the Presidency: These marches began to go out of peaceful range throwing Molotov cocktails and history and trying to storm the gates of the palace and climb the walls
Presidential statement: The Presidency affirms that such subversive practices have nothing to do with the principles of the revolution or with any legitimate practices of peaceful expression
Presidency statement: The presidency carries the political forces that could have contributed to inciting full political responsibility in anticipation of the results of the investigation
Presidency Statement: The Presidency calls upon all national forces to immediately condemn such practices and call on their supporters to immediately leave the surroundings of the palace
Presidency statement: The Presidency of the Republic affirms that the security services will deal with the utmost determination to implement the law and protect state facilities

Serikali imefanya, inafanya na ina mipango ya kufanya mambo mengi mazuri kwa ajili ya kuleta maendeleo katika Mikoa ya Mtwara na Lindi.
Serikali ya Awamu ya Tatu ilijenga daraja katika Mto Rufiji, hatua kubwa katika kutatua shida ya usafiri kwenye mikoa ya Kusini.
Nliachiwa kazi ya kukamilisha ujenzi wa barabara za lami kufikia darajani na kuunganisha Mkoa wa Mtwara na Mkoa wa Ruvuma na imetekelezwa.
Tumekamilisha pia ujenzi wa Daraja la Umoja katika mto Ruvuma na ujenzi wa barabara ya lami kuanzia Mikoa ya Mtwara na Ruvuma.
Katika kukamilisha ujenzi wa barabara ya “Mtwara Corridor” kazi iliyobaki ni kutoka Mbinga kwenda Mbamba Bay kazi ambayo tutaifanya wenyewe.
Tunafanya upanuzi wa Bandari ya Mtwara na ujenzi wa gati mpya na tayari eneo la bandari limeongezwa kutoka hekta 70.68 hadi 2,693.68.
Tunapanua na kuijenga upya Bandari ya Lindi na kituo cha kuchakata gesi asilia huku mipango ya ujenzi wa Bandari ya Kilwa nayo ikiwa mbioni.
Disemba mwaka 2012 nilitoa agizo VETA kuwa na mitaala ihusuyo sekta ya gesi na mafuta kwa vijana wetu na tayari hili limetekelezwa.
Wizara ya Nishati na Madini inadhamini wanafunzi 10 kupata mafunzo katika Chuo Kikuu cha Dodoma ambako kozi za mafuta na gesi zinatolewa.
Kipaumbele cha nafasi hizo 10 za mafunzo ni kwa vijana wa Lindi na Mtwara na tayari vijana watatu wamepatikana na wananufaika na mpango huo.
Disemba 2012 nilizungumza na viongozi wa Manispaa ya Mtwara na kuwaeleza hitaji la wao kuwa na master plan ya mjini wa Mtwara.
Wizara ya Ardhi, Nyumba na Makazi inashirikiana na Manispaa ya Mtwara kukamilisha mpango (Master Plan) wa mji wa kisasa wa uchumi wa gesi.
Kukamilika kwa mpango mji huo kutawezesha takribani makampuni 51 ambayo tayari yako tayari kuwekeza katika maeneo mbalimbali kuanza kazi zao
Mpango wa kutumia gesi ya Mnazi Bay (Msimbati) haujafa na wala haujahamishiwa Dar es Salaam wala Bagamoyo. Mpango bado upo Msimbati.
Mpango huo utazalisha megawati 600 za umeme zitakazotumika Mtwara na nyingine kuingizwa gridi ya Taifa kupitia Songea.
Ujenzi wa kiwanda cha saruji na kile cha mbolea (Dangote) bado unabaki kusini na hakujawahi kuwa na mpango wowote wa kuhamisha jambo hilo.
Gesi itakayoletwa Dar es Salaam ni 16% ya gesi yote iliyoko Mtwara kwa miaka 20 ijayo. 84% ya gesi itabaki Mtwara kwa ajili ya kuuzwa nje.
Tunawathamini wananchi wa Mtwara. Nitakuwa mtu wa mwisho kuwatupa mkono na kuwapuuza wananchi wa Kusini na sitaruhusu mkoa wowote kupuuzwa.

The great resources and potential of our nation are in no way commensurate with its current reality, and this clearly reflects the enormous tasks entrusted to us.
Our country occupies one-sixth of the land area and is home to about a quarter of the Earth's population and owns more than half of the world's oil and gas reserves
Our country is full of promising young people who are our hope for a distinct reality and a promising future and represent more than half the nation's population
The epicenter of conflict and tension in our Islamic world is still growing between the wounds of subterranean Palestine and Syria and the borders of the Muslim world.
It is fair to say that our organization has made and is making a lot of effort in various fields to overcome the difficulties to achieve progress and prosperity for our peoples
The Organization's organs and institutions work to achieve integration in the fields of economic, scientific and technological cooperation
The efforts of the Organization of the Islamic Conference (OIC) have made remarkable progress in several areas during the past period
1. The contribution of Member States to world trade volume has increased
2. The volume of trade among the OIC countries increased to 17.8%, approaching 20% ​​by 2015
We still need to do more in the fields of education and scientific research
We need to encourage inter-OIC tourism programs, especially cultural and scientific tourism, and adopt strict scientific standards to achieve this

I promise you to make every effort during the presidency of Egypt for the twelfth session to strengthen cooperation and joint Islamic action and to raise the level of coordination between the institutions and organs of our Organization
There are major issues concerning the present and future of our Islamic world as a whole that should be addressed by the president
1- The dilemmas arising from the lack of education and religious culture and the decline of the ability of societies to provide sound religious education
2 - The negative image of Islam and Muslim communities
3 - The suffering of a number of Muslim communities in many countries of the phenomenon of Islamophobia # President
I call on the world countries and their international institutions to take the necessary measures and legislate to confront all attempts to incite hatred, discrimination and violence against people
4. To promote and activate dialogue and understanding between the Islamic world and other countries and gatherings so as to ensure mutual respect
5 - the need to address sectarian strife and sectarianism at the nation level through dialogue and education # President
If we do not put down the sedition together, it will take place in the body of the nation
I commend what we agreed during our extraordinary summit in Makkah to establish a center for dialogue between the Islamic sects in Riyadh

It is one of the reasons of Egypt's pride that its flowers and scientists have been and will continue to be the champions of the Islamic sciences in order to contain the danger of sedition and spread the true religion in the Islamic world

The suffering of some countries of our nation from difficult humanitarian situations calls for consideration of the development of the existing relief system and the restructuring of relief funds of the Organization # President

Egypt, with its revolution, which has risen to uphold the values ​​of freedom, democracy, shura, social justice and history, is committed to stability and clarity with the support of the Palestinian people
Egypt sought to support our brethren trapped in the Gaza Strip and stop the brutal aggression against them, which is what God has done to us thanks to our right to their pure blood.
We congratulate our brothers in Palestine on the success achieved by the United Nations General Assembly resolution to elevate the status of Palestine to an observer state.
Our solidarity can tell us the common goals # President
We place the international community under its responsibility in the need to take specific measures and effective steps to stop the illegal settlement activities immediately and without delay

Syria's wounds continue to bleed and the hearts of our hearts are destroyed and the human tragedy continues and their blood is still open.
Egypt is keen to put an end to the Syrian crisis as soon as possible, our right to the blood of its people and to preserve the unity of Syria and the capabilities of its great people.

The regime in Syria must read history and realize its immortal lesson that the people are the ones who remain and that those who are above their personal interests above the interests of their people are going
Egypt's ongoing efforts, initiated by launching the Quartet initiative at the Mecca summit to end the suffering of the Syrian people, are based on clear principles
1. Preserving the integrity of Syria's soil
2 - spare Syria the risk of foreign military intervention, which we reject # President
3 - Ensure that any political process includes all segments of the Syrian people without exclusion on the basis of race, religion or sectarian # President
We have begun a dialogue with the regional and international parties concerned to reach a settlement to the Syrian crisis that fulfills the aspirations of its people for a better future
